text.p: You have advantage on checks related to navigating and crewing boats.
Each day, your purpose aligns with one of the Old Gods. Choose one of the below options after you complete a rest; you gain its benefits until you complete your next rest.

list.li: Odin. You regain 1d4 HP every time you kill an enemy.
Freya. You gain a luck token if you don't have one. Each time you use a luck token, add 1d6 to your roll.
Loki. You have advantage on checks to lie, sneak, and hide.

text.p: If you wield a shield, you can use your action to take a defensive stance. Your AC becomes 20 during this time.
